sec.p:
We use the DFO-2006
52 timescale for the past ~342,000 years and the AICC2012
53 timescale for the period older than ~344,000 years
14 . The AICC2012
53, 54 chronology is used for EDC and EDML. The accumulation rates at DF were deduced from the Î´ 18O record by Dome Fuji Community members
14 , and those at EDC and EDML were taken from [ 53,54].
